Object.Description: Tribute to RoTF
Used by Jupiter, Neptune, and Pluto to overthrow their Father, Saturn.
A blade of exceptional physical prowess belonging to one of the many treasures of the lost lands.
During the Shatter's age of ruin, the Sentinel spent weeks on end slaying the oncoming forces hoping to claim the treasures.
The world will know their power...
A legendary sword that belongs to a King, this sword contains extraordinary attributes capable of killing someone in an instant.
Legend has it that this sword created by Elemental Water has killed many people, so that why is called Massacre.
This sword is connected to the earth, its connection gives it unmatched strength to beat any rival.
A completely golden sword from the great Golden Oryx. Its edge is so strong that it can kill anyone in an instant.
A Sword of Archdemon Malphas, the king of Hell.

This broad sword is powerfully held with every might and power it draws from its pending slash. This is made by the strongly enchanted horns of Oryx. No event or mob can conquer this weapon with the divine enigma it holds.
A sword with an impossibly sharp edge. It has been designed with holy magic to slash like no other blade.
Ripped from the remains of the King's Avatar. It is oddly smaller than the rest of the corpse.
The unlikely marriage of polar opposites, such an event can only lead to disaster.
While not quite as powerful as the real Death's scythe, this replica certainly does not lack power.
A branch with leaves, his creator was the king of the Tiki Tiki. It contain the power of Nature.
A magical wooden staff topped A branch with a fungus on the tip, has the power of the nature of the fungus, its red and white colors gives it the touch of power.
This rod, with its incredible power destroys and incinerates everything you see, only a good carrier can use this weapon..
A Staff with a Emerald Gem at the tip, the Wood comes from Magic Forest that make this Staff powerful.
A commanding staff used by vile cult leaders. It has a strange force inside it that prevents it from facing forward of the user.
An ancient staff used both for sacrifice and communion with the gods.
It is said that this staff has immense damage capabilities, comparable to those of the Mad God.
When her trident proved ineffective, Thessal always carried around her trusty rod to kill particularly troublesome intruders.
The manifestation of Ayrin's envy of her master's overwhelming might and allure. Even without its owner, it remains uniquely bitter.
A Katana that we don't know where it comes from.

This katana comes from the best Samurai in all of Japan. The Samurai died in a fight with a Corrupt Talisman. This katana has the power of the Samurai, when you use it, you will feel a true power throughout the body, but, having been touched by a Corrupt, it has negative effects...
This Earth Kantana, which comes from another galaxy, is forged with Heavenly Earth. You can cut everything your way.
This katana formed by the powers of the wind has an incredible speed, cuts everything you see in its path.
Katana imbued with acid, created by the same crazy scientist Dr. Terrible. It takes the number of times that the creation of it went wrong.
The Katana of the Snake Queen, Stheno Queen.
The shots of this Wand are as powerful as Elemental Water. The formation of stones and water gives it extraordinary power and grip.
This Wand, with its magnificent powers of fire, incinerates everything that lies ahead.
A powerful torment of a ghost keeps the power of the Wand. That power can be used for evil, or for good ...
This Wand is made to get the pain of others, use it with caution.
A wand forged by the bats.

Long ago,geb,nut,and bes used to be cruel gods.Brave adventurers kept trying to take them down,until eventually one adventurer defeated them all.Nut and Bes were easy for the adventurer to handle,but geb was not.After long hours of battling,the adventurer cut off geb's hand and put the three gods under a curse to keep the world safe.Geb now awaits for someone to free them from the curse so he can finally get revenge.
It is not often that a succubus falls for a mortal, but their love when they do is overwhelmingly powerful. If manifested, its power can rival that of gods.
The drawstring of this particular bow isn't made to notch traditional arrows, rather it is designed to fling fangs at high velocity.
Boshy Gun.
This Bow, forged with the heavenly lands, has a power coming from space. His speed and damage make him very strong.
The arrows of this Bow go at a speed very close to the light thanks to the power of the wind. Cut and go through everything that points.
Every shot that hits a target frees the soul of a forgotten hero. Every shot that misses is trapped for eternity.
One of the main cannons the ghost ship had to sink other ships, the ghostly aura within it has the power to shoot many cannon balls at once.

As soon as Nut heard that a brave adventurer killed her ally,she became furious. She brought out her bow,and tried to shoot the adventurer from the heavens,but the adventurer dodged each attack,and kept climbing up the different arrows to reach heaven. With one slash,Nut was beaten. The bow was transferred into the adventurers hand,to help him beat geb.
Such a large and unwieldy blade. Who'd be foolish enough to try to branish it...?
A crude dagger consisting of a shard of the Realm's Crystal with a handle of cloth. Despite it's makeshift nature, it is immensely deadly.
This dagger was used by the Tiki Tiki's enemy.

This dagger, which comes from the depths of realm, was used to overthrow the skull shrine, with it, it was able to melt even the hottest, coldest, and hardest thing there is, for this reason, it is called "Melted Shrine".
Its control with water makes attacks more fluid, more unpredictable and stronger.
This dagger was created from Malphas' spine
The manifestation of Tamir's lust for mortals. Even without its owner, it remains uniquely needy.
